Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.cards.Bank

  • public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the administration of game resources (cards, buildings, etc.)

    thyer

    • Method Detail

      • buyDevCard

        public DevCard buyDevCard(User purchaser)
        Removes the necessary ResourceCards from the player's hand and returns a randomly drawn DevCard Throws an exception if canBuyDevCard returns false
        Parameters:
        purchaser - the Player buying the DevCard
        Returns:
        a randomly drawn DevCard pulled from the deck

      • canBuyDevCard

        public boolean canBuyDevCard()
        Checks to see if a purchase of a DevCard
        Returns:
        true if possible, false if impossible

      • canDrawResourceCard

        public boolean canDrawResourceCard(ResourceCard type)
        Checks to see if the desiredResourceCard can be drawn
        Parameters:
        type - a ResourceCard with the enumeration attribute of the desired card to be returned
        Returns:
        true if possible, false if impossible

      • canPieceBeAwarded

        public boolean canPieceBeAwarded(PieceType type)
        Determines whether the given Piece can be purchased
        Parameters:
        type - the type of Piece desired
        Returns:
        false if the Piece cannot otherwise be awarded, else true
